====Usage notes====
Often used interchangeably in compounds with {{m|ja|器|tr=ki}} to indicate “machine”, with the distinction that {{lang|ja|機}} implies a larger machine, such as an airplane, while {{lang|ja|器}} implies a smaller device, possibly hand-held. Compare {{m|ja|飛行機|tr=hikōki||airplane}} with {{m|ja|食器|tr=shokki||tableware}}.

====Alternative forms====
機 has many {{w|ryakuji}} (handwritten abbreviations), as it is a common character with many strokes (16):
* {{l|ja|Image:RYAKUJI_ki_01.png|40px}} A {{w|phono-semantic}} simplification from [[on'yomi]] of “ki” (katakana キ): 木 + キ (semantic plus simplified phonetic) – compare [[File:Ryakuji GI.png|30px]] for [[議]] and [[File:RYAKUJI ma.png|30px]] for [[魔]]/[[摩]].
* {{l|ja|Image:RYAKUJI_ki_02.png|40px}} Graphical simplification.
* {{l|ja|Image:RYAKUJI_ki_03.png|40px}} Graphical simplification.
* {{l|ja|Image:RYAKUJI_ki_04.png|40px}} Graphical simplification.

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|き}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=き}} {{m|zh|機|tr=kjɨj||mechanism}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''ki''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|き|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|き}}

# a [[machine]], a [[device]]; a [[contraption]]
# a [[loom]]
# an [[opportunity]], a [[chance]] to do something; the [[right]] time or [[moment]]
# something of great [[importance]]: the [[linchpin]] of the matter
# [[resourcefulness]]
# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=き}} the [[moment]] of being moved into action by the [[teachings]] of the [[Buddha]]: see {{l|ja|機根|tr=''kikon''}}
# by extension, the [[workings]] of the [[heart]] or [[mind]] in general
# in [[Noh]] [[theater]], the [[breath]] of the [[mind]]
# short for {{m|ja|飛行機|tr=hikōki}}: an [[airplane]], an [[aircraft]]
# short for {{m|ja|機関銃|tr=kikanjū}}: a [[machine gun]]

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|機が熟する|き が じゅくする}}: the [[time is ripe]]; a [[golden opportunity]]
* {{ja-r|機に乗じる|き に じょうじる}}, {{ja-r|機に投じる|き に とうじる}}: to [[sieze the moment]], to [[jump at the chance]]
* {{ja-r|機に臨み変に応ずる|き に のぞみ へん に おうずる}}, {{ja-r|機に応ずる|き に おうずる}}: to [[move with the times]]
* {{ja-r|機に因って法を説く|き に よって ほう を とく}}: to change the [[message]] to [[suit]] one's [[audience]]: to [[alter]] the [[format]] or [[presentation]] for better [[acceptance]], without changing the [[core]] [[idea]]s being [[convey]]ed
* {{ja-r|機を逸する|き を いっする}}, {{ja-r|機を失する|き を しっする}}: to [[miss the boat]], to [[miss out]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|こぶち}}
Alteration from {{ja-r|こうべうち}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> itself a compound of {{m|ja|首|tr=kōbe||head}} + {{m|ja|打ち|tr=uchi||striking, hitting}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|こぶち|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|首打}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こぶち}}

# a [[trap]] or [[snare]] that works by [[behead]]ing the [[bird]] or [[beast]] caught in it

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|はた}}
From [[onomatopoeic]] {{m|ja|はた|tr=hata}}, possibly for the sound of the shuttle running back and forth, or for the sound of a woven cloth moving in the wind, compare {{m|ja|旗|tr=hata||a flag}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|はた|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はた}}

# a [[loom]]
# [[woven]] [[cloth]]

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|わかつり}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|機る|tr=wakatsuru||to [[manipulate]] something}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> itself an alteration of {{m|ja|誘る|tr=okotsuru||to [[manipulate]] or [[con]] someone}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> a compound of {{m|ja|痴|tr=oko||a fool}} + {{m|ja|釣る|tr=tsuru||to [[fish]], to [[draw out]]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|わかつり}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|わかつり}}

# to [[manipulate]] {{qualifier|as in a device}}
# to [[manipulate]] {{qualifier|as in a person}}: to [[deceive]], to [[take in]] someone
# to get on someone's right side; to [[humor]] someone; to [[make an effort]] to [[please]] someone
